June 6, 1960 D Daily Herald Brighton Open Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
Daily Herald Brighton Open Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Daily Herald Brighton Open Brass Band Festival daily-herald-brighton-open-brass-band-fe-2898
None
Corn Exchange, Brighton Prizes - 1st £15.15s. and trophy, 2nd £12.12s. and trophy, 3rd £7.7s. 11 bands competed.
May 17, 2014, 7:23 a.m. April 6, 2021, 10:36 a.m.
